item.title: An Abstraction of House Parties
item.description: House parties are a common social gathering and pastime in the college ecosystem. There are many factors that attribute to the success rate of these events such as location, timing, gender ratio, available space, marketing, and music. This study hopes to examine the nature of them by accessing data from
item.dc:creator: Krom
item.content:encoded:
House parties are a common social gathering and pastime in the college ecosystem. There are many factors that attribute to the success rate of these events such as location, timing, gender ratio, available space, marketing, and music. This study hopes to examine the nature of them by accessing data from twitter and instagram in order to determine how successful it can be. We will be focusing on girl to guy ratio (emphasis on the girls) as well as time of day the events are posted to social networks. A friend of mine (wassup Cam!!) had a party on a pretty big weekend in our city and I figured that it would be the perfect time to collect some data. Using google charts I was able to generate these cool charts. Check them out.


CONCLUSION:

As the party was reaching its peak the feds came through and shut it down, so no after party information was collected, but in case you were wondering it was live!!

item.title: Final Four Map
item.description: I'm not going to lie, as odd as it may seem I don't follow sports too much. The arguments my friends have is the closet thing to ESPN to me. Anyway, during the national championship I thought it would be cool to scrape some data from Twitter just to see
item.dc:creator: Krom
item.content:encoded: I'm not going to lie, as odd as it may seem I don't follow sports too much. The arguments my friends have is the closet thing to ESPN to me. Anyway, during the national championship I thought it would be cool to scrape some data from Twitter just to see what folks were talking about.I believe I got roughly 11000 tweets. Check it out.. Oh yeah it is interactive, so click around and see who was hating.

item.title: Prelude
item.description: I have always enjoyed good journalism, so I thought it would be a cool idea for me to start something of my own. I will share my projects, ideas, and things that I learn every now and then. A little about myself.....I am a young black male, computer science
item.dc:creator: Krom
item.content:encoded: I have always enjoyed good journalism, so I thought it would be a cool idea for me to start something of my own. I will share my projects, ideas, and things that I learn every now and then. A little about myself.....I am a young black male, computer science background, hypebeast, and scholar. Hope you enjoy.
